Enums/MovingState.html#/s:FO6ArcKit11Mov.name: moving
Enums/MovingState.html#/s:FO6ArcKit11Mov.abstract: The device has been determined to be moving between places, based on available location data.

Enums/MovingState.html#/s:FO6ArcKit11Mov.name: stationary
Enums/MovingState.html#/s:FO6ArcKit11Mov.abstract: The device has been determined to be either stationary, or moving less than the current location accuracy in

Enums/MovingState.html#/s:FO6ArcKit11Mov.name: uncertain
Enums/MovingState.html#/s:FO6ArcKit11Mov.abstract: The device’s moving / stationary state could not be confidently determined.

Enums/MovingState.html.name: MovingState
Enums/MovingState.html.abstract: The device’s location moving / stationary state at a point in time.

Classes/LocomotionManager.html#/s:vC6Arc.abstract: The maximum desired location accuracy in metres. Set this value to your highest required accuracy.

Classes/LocomotionManager.html#/s:FC6Arc.name: startCoreMotion()
Classes/LocomotionManager.html#/s:FC6Arc.abstract: Start monitoring Core Motion activity types, pedometer data, and accelerometer data.

Classes/LocomotionManager.html#/s:FC6Arc.name: stopCoreMotion()
Classes/LocomotionManager.html#/s:FC6Arc.abstract: Stop monitoring Core Motion activity types, pedometer data, and accelerometer data.

Classes/LocomotionManager.html#/s:vC6Arc.abstract: The device authorisation state for monitoring Core Motion data.

Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:vC6ArcK.name: date
Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:vC6ArcK.abstract: The timestamp for the weighted centre of the sample period. Equivalent to location.timestamp.

Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:vC6ArcK.name: location
Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:vC6ArcK.abstract: The sample’s smoothed location, equivalent to the weighted centre of the sample’s filteredLocations.

Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:vC6ArcK.name: rawLocations
Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:vC6ArcK.abstract: The raw locations received over the sample duration.

Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:vC6ArcK.name: filteredLocations
Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:vC6ArcK.abstract: The Kalman filtered locations recorded over the sample duration.

Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:vC6ArcK.name: movingState
Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:vC6ArcK.abstract: The moving or stationary state for the sample. See MovingState for details on possible values.

Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:vC6ArcK.name: stepHz
Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:vC6ArcK.abstract: The user’s walking/running/cycling cadence (steps per second) over the sample duration.

Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:vC6ArcK.name: courseVariance
Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:vC6ArcK.abstract: The degree of variance in course direction over the sample duration.

Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:vC6ArcK.name: xyAcceleration
Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:vC6ArcK.abstract: The average amount of accelerometer motion on the XY plane over the sample duration.

Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:vC6ArcK.name: zAcceleration
Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:vC6ArcK.abstract: The average amount of accelerometer motion on the Z axis over the sample duration.

Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:vC6ArcK.name: coreMotionActivityType
Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:vC6ArcK.abstract: The highest scoring Core Motion activity type

Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:vC6ArcK.name: timeOfDay
Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:vC6ArcK.abstract: A convenience getter for the sample’s time interval since start of day.
